name: You were banished to the Fusilli Dimension
name_original: You were banished to the Fusilli Dimension
description:
You were banished to the Fusilli Dimension and now have to survive being swarmed by Noodle-Men. Enjoy

WASD - Move

MOUSE - Aim

SPACE - Jump

CTRL (hold) - Crouch

LMB - Shotgun

RMB - Grenade Launcher

TAB (hold) - show debug and stats
